sent.orig: To understand Wang's fiction, readers need to understand the relationship between sadism masochism.
sent.trans: 想要理解王小波的小说，必须首先理解虐恋情结。

sent.orig: If you want to understand Shanghai, to Shanghainese, you must primarily understand Shi Ku Men.
sent.trans: 要读懂上海，读懂上海人，就必须先读懂石库门。

sent.orig: To correctly understand the exotic culture, and to understand the native culture.
sent.trans: 既要正确理解异国文化，又要理解本族文化。

sent.orig: People may not understand genes or genomes but they certainly understand races.
sent.trans: 人们也许不懂得基因或者基因组但是一定知道人种。

sent.orig: In order to understand recursion, one must first understand recursion.
sent.trans: “要知道什么是‘递归’，你首先需要知道‘递归’”——无名氏。
